champions.name: Lyra
champions.metaDescription: A radiant warrior of the mystical Amazons, Lyra channels the brilliance of the sun. Born in the heart of the sacred forest, she guards the ancient tree of life, defending it with unyielding resolve. Her light-infused arrows seek justice and truth, making her a beacon of hope for her people.

champions.name: Elysia
champions.metaDescription: Once a proud Amazon warrior, Elysia was corrupted by the lure of dark magic. Now wielding shadowed blades and surrounded by an aura of fear, she thrives in the chaos of battle, leading her tribe with ruthless cunning. Her heart, now lost to darkness, seeks only power and domination.

champions.name: Seraphina
champions.metaDescription: Seraphina, the Flame Amazon, wields the power of fire with unmatched ferocity. Born in the heart of a blazing volcano, she channels her rage into battle, leaving a trail of scorched earth in her wake. Her burning passion for justice fuels her quest to rid the world of tyranny.

champions.name: Fiorella
champions.metaDescription: Fiorella, swift as the wind, dances through the battlefield with grace and precision. Her connection to the winds grants her unparalleled speed, making her a blur in combat. With each strike of her spear, she commands the breeze to follow her will, creating gusts that send enemies flying.

champions.name: Morwen
champions.metaDescription: Morwen, protector of the seas, draws strength from the deep oceans. Her power flows with the tides, allowing her to command water as both a healer and warrior. With a mere whisper, she can calm the seas, embodying the ocean's grace and strength. Her presence brings peace to turbulent waters and renewal to those under her protection.

champions.name: Karna
champions.metaDescription: Karna, a legendary assassin born from the light itself, wields her blade with precision and honor. Once a guardian of sacred temples, she now hunts the enemies of the light, ensuring balance is maintained in the realms. Her strikes are swift and silent, leaving no trace behind.

champions.name: Keres
champions.metaDescription: Silent as the shadows, Keres is a master of death who serves a dark covenant. Trained in the art of assassination, she can slip through the veil of night, unseen and unheard. Her targets never realize their fate until it’s too late, as she weaves terror into the hearts of those who oppose her.

champions.name: Nergal
champions.metaDescription: Nergal, known as the Flame Wraith, is an assassin who strikes with the heat of a thousand suns. He harnesses the power of fire to burn away his enemies without a trace. Every mark he sets his eyes on is incinerated by his deadly touch, leaving only scorched earth in his wake.

champions.name: Ravana
champions.metaDescription: Ravana, known as the Whispering Blade, moves like a phantom, striking with the speed of a hurricane. His connection to the wind allows him to vanish without a trace, only to reappear behind his target with lethal precision. His blades sing through the air as he eliminates his prey before they can even draw a breath.

champions.name: Fuma
champions.metaDescription: Fuma, a shadow of the deep waters, has mastered the art of flowing through the battlefield like a current. Trained by an ancient order of water assassins, he moves unseen, striking with the force of a tidal wave before vanishing beneath the surface, leaving only ripples of fear.

champions.name: Vritra
champions.metaDescription: Once a majestic dragon, Vritra was resurrected from the bones of an ancient guardian to protect the celestial realms. Now an ethereal Bone Dragon bathed in radiant energy, Vritra commands the forces of light to fend off the darkness that threatens the cosmos.

champions.name: Grimroth
champions.metaDescription: Grimroth, a fearsome Bone Dragon, was once a revered dragon king before he was corrupted by the dark forces. Now a skeletal horror, he serves as a harbinger of death, breathing shadowy fire upon the living and seeking to drag the world into eternal darkness.

champions.name: Osseus
champions.metaDescription: Osseus, the Fire BoneDragon, is a skeletal monstrosity wreathed in flames, born from the ashes of ancient volcanic eruptions. His bony wings spread fire wherever he flies, and his molten breath incinerates anything in its path. Osseus craves destruction, and his insatiable hunger for devastation has earned him the title "Bringer of Ash."

champions.name: Zilant
champions.metaDescription: Zilant, the Wind BoneDragon, is an ancient skeletal beast whose roars echo across the mountains. His bones are carried by powerful winds, and his wings stir the air into devastating whirlwinds. Zilant’s breath summons tempests that tear through the land, leaving desolation in his wake. He is the embodiment of the wild and uncontrollable winds.

champions.name: Sepulcris
champions.metaDescription: Sepulcris, the Water BoneDragon, lurks in the depths of forgotten lakes and oceans, his skeletal form hidden beneath the waves. He rises from the deep with the force of a tidal wave, his bones dripping with the cold embrace of the abyss. Sepulcris is a silent predator, using the ocean’s currents to strike unexpectedly, his presence heralding doom for sailors and sea creatures alike.

champions.name: Durin
champions.metaDescription: Durin, the master engineer of light, forges weapons that harness celestial energy. His cannons, infused with radiant power, unleash blasts of pure light that can disintegrate even the toughest foes. A stalwart defender of the innocent, he builds machines of war to protect his homeland from dark forces.

champions.name: Andvari
champions.metaDescription: Andvari, the Dark Cannon, is a reclusive inventor who harnesses the destructive power of dark matter. His cannons unleash void energy, obliterating anything in their path. Andvari’s obsession with the unknown has led him down a path of shadowy experimentation, and while his weapons are unmatched in their destructive power, their toll on his soul is heavy.

champions.name: Alberich
champions.metaDescription: Alberich is a pyrotechnic genius who crafts devastating cannons powered by molten fire. With a love for explosions and destruction, he takes great pride in the fiery devastation he unleashes upon his enemies. His laughter echoes across the battlefield as his cannons roar, reducing armies to ash.

champions.name: Eitri
champions.metaDescription: Eitri, the wind-blessed cannon master, harnesses the fury of the skies to craft weapons of immense power. With his wind-infused cannons, he rains down destruction from afar, scattering his foes like leaves in a storm. His precision and power are unmatched, making him a formidable force on the battlefield.

champions.name: Dvalin
champions.metaDescription: Dvalin, a master of water-powered cannons, channels the strength of the ocean to destroy his enemies. Every blast from his cannon mimics the force of crashing waves, obliterating anything in its path. His machines are as relentless as the tides themselves.

champions.name: Nordri
champions.metaDescription: Nordri, a stalwart defender of the light, forges weapons of divine purity deep within the mountain halls. With his shining hammer, he creates artifacts that glow with celestial energy, empowering his allies and burning away the darkness that threatens his realm.

champions.name: Dargrim
champions.metaDescription: Dargrim, the Dark Dwarf, is a cunning and ruthless leader of an underground empire. His greed for rare metals and gems knows no bounds, and he is willing to destroy entire mountains to get what he wants. Dargrim’s mastery of the forge allows him to create powerful weapons and armor, which he uses to enforce his will on those who dare oppose him.

champions.name: Brokkr
champions.metaDescription: Brokkr, the fire-hearted dwarf, thrives in the heat of his forge, crafting weapons that blaze with the fury of molten lava. His passion for battle is as fierce as the flames he commands, and his warhammer leaves nothing but scorched earth in its wake.

champions.name: Sindri
champions.metaDescription: Sindri, a master craftsman of the winds, creates weapons that hum with the essence of the air itself. His axes and hammers are light yet devastating, carried by gusts of wind, striking faster than the eye can see. His genius lies in melding steel with the breath of nature.

champions.name: Thrain
champions.metaDescription: Thrain is a master of watercraft, shaping the rivers and seas with his engineering prowess. As the guardian of the coastal cities, he constructs massive fortresses that rise from the ocean's depths, and his water-infused hammer strikes with the power of a tidal wave. His calm demeanor masks a fierce loyalty to his people.

champions.name: Ao Guang
champions.metaDescription: Ao Guang, the majestic Elemental Dragon of Light, governs the realm of light with ancient wisdom. His scales shine like the dawn, and with a single roar, he can summon beams of radiant energy to cleanse the world of darkness. Ao Guang’s presence is a beacon of hope for all who fight to preserve the light.

champions.name: Obsidian
champions.metaDescription: Obsidian, the dark Elemental Dragon, was born from the abyss of shadows. His power comes from the void itself, and with every beat of his wings, he brings calamity to the land. Legends say that wherever Obsidian flies, light fades and the ground trembles with fear.

champions.name: Kaen
champions.metaDescription: Kaen, the Fire Elemental Dragon, is a living embodiment of volcanic wrath. His scales glow with molten energy, and wherever he flies, the land erupts into flame. As a symbol of destruction and rebirth, Kaen is both feared and revered, for his flames cleanse the world of its impurities.

champions.name: Mizuchi
champions.metaDescription: Mizuchi, the Wind Dragon, commands the gales with unmatched mastery. His roar can summon storms, and his agile form dances through the air like a leaf in the wind. Revered as the dragon of tempests, Mizuchi's power lies in his ability to create chaos with a single gust.

champions.name: Leviathan
champions.metaDescription: Leviathan, the ancient Elemental Dragon of the deep, commands the untamed power of the oceans. His presence brings forth tsunamis and tidal waves, and his wrath can drown entire cities. He is a force of nature, indifferent to the struggles of mortals, as vast and powerful as the oceans he rules.

champions.name: Lumina
champions.metaDescription: Lumina, the radiant Fairy Dragon, spreads light and joy wherever she flies. Born from the first dawn, she is a symbol of hope and renewal. Her wings shimmer like stardust, and her presence lifts spirits, dispelling the shadows with a soft, warm glow that heals and protects.

champions.name: Fafnir
champions.metaDescription: Fafnir, a mischievous yet sinister Fairy Dragon, once lived in the enchanted groves of the fae but turned to dark magic after a fateful betrayal. Now she manipulates the forces of night, luring the unwary into the labyrinth of the underworld, where her whispers bring eternal sleep.

champions.name: Sylphid
champions.metaDescription: Sylphid, a fierce and fiery Fairy Dragon, was born from the heart of a volcano. With wings that flicker like flames, she embodies the raw power of fire, using her fiery breath to incinerate her enemies. Though small, her wrath burns hotter than any inferno.

champions.name: Kiyohime
champions.metaDescription: Kiyohime, a swift and mysterious Fairy Dragon of the wind, is as elusive as the breeze. Legends tell of her shifting between realms, appearing only in moments of great need. Her wings hum with the force of a hurricane, and her playful nature hides a devastating power capable of summoning storms.

champions.name: Bakunawa
champions.metaDescription: Bakunawa, the serpentine Fairy Dragon of water, is said to control the tides with a flick of her tail. Her graceful movements through the seas leave behind whirlpools and waves. Revered as a protector of the ocean, she defends her watery realm with an unrelenting surge of power.

champions.name: Nicothoe
champions.metaDescription: Nicothoe, a Harpy of pure light, embodies grace and mercy. Her radiant wings are said to glow with the power of the stars, and her songs heal the wounded. As a guardian of light, she descends upon battlefields to protect the innocent, blinding her enemies with her brilliant aura.

champions.name: Celaeno
champions.metaDescription: Celaeno, the Harpy of Shadows, glides silently through the night skies, hunting her prey with predatory precision. She revels in the chaos she spreads, her talons dripping with the darkness that blinds her foes. Her haunting song drains the strength of those who hear it, leaving them helpless against her swift attacks.

champions.name: Podarge
champions.metaDescription: Podarge is a ferocious Harpy whose wings blaze with the fury of volcanic fire. She swoops down on her enemies in a whirlwind of flames, her rage unmatched in the skies. Podarge thrives in chaos, igniting the battlefield with her relentless attacks, leaving only charred remains in her wake.

champions.name: Aello
champions.metaDescription: Aello, the tempestuous Wind Harpy, flies with the fury of a hurricane. Known for her agility, she moves with blinding speed, leaving a trail of destruction in her wake. Aello thrives in chaos, using her sharp talons and windswept wings to tear through her enemies with the power of a violent storm.

champions.name: Ocypete
champions.metaDescription: Ocypete, the swift Harpy of the waters, is as elusive as a flowing river. Her wings glisten with droplets, and she moves through the skies with the grace of a sea breeze. A defender of the seas, Ocypete summons water torrents to drown her enemies, leaving no trace of their existence.

champions.name: Inugami
champions.metaDescription: Inugami, the guardian spirit of the light, is a Hell Hound bound to protect sacred shrines from malevolent spirits. His glowing aura is said to ward off evil, and his howl calls forth divine forces. A loyal protector, he ensures that no darkness corrupts the lands he watches over.

champions.name: Garmr
champions.metaDescription: Garmr, the dark Hellhound, is a terrifying beast born in the depths of the underworld. His fiery red eyes and shadowy form make him a symbol of impending doom. As a guardian of the dark gates, Garmr’s howl can summon the dead, and his bite leaves behind a trail of cursed flames.

champions.name: Cerberus
champions.metaDescription: Guardian of the fiery gates of the underworld, Cerberus is a fearsome three-headed Hell Hound who ensures that the dead never escape. His flames burn with the intensity of the inferno, and his growl alone is enough to strike terror into the hearts of the wicked.

champions.name: Barghest
champions.metaDescription: Barghest, the wind-bound Hellhound, haunts the lonely roads at night, a spectral figure born from the winds of the afterlife. His howl brings chilling gusts, and he appears to those marked by fate. Barghest is both a harbinger and an executor, swift as the wind, and just as merciless.

champions.name: Amarok
champions.metaDescription: Amarok, the Water Hellhound, prowls the frozen tundras, a creature of ice and vengeance. His icy breath can freeze the blood in an enemy’s veins, and his sharp claws leave behind frostbitten wounds. Amarok is a lone hunter, feared by all who venture into the cold, as he strikes without mercy, leaving nothing but ice in his wake.

champions.name: Callista
champions.metaDescription: Callista, the Light Huntress, is a beacon of hope in the darkest of forests. Armed with a bow infused with radiant energy, she hunts down evil wherever it lurks. Her arrows shine like shooting stars, piercing the hearts of the wicked with divine precision. She is justice incarnate, swift and sure in her pursuit of righteousness.

champions.name: Vespera
champions.metaDescription: Vespera, the shadowy Huntress, strikes fear into the hearts of those who wander too far into the dark forests. With unmatched precision, she hunts her prey in the silence of night, blending seamlessly into the shadows. Vespera's arrows are laced with darkness itself, ensuring her victims never see the light again.

champions.name: Rowena
champions.metaDescription: Rowena, the Fire Huntress, stalks the wilderness with a burning vengeance. Her arrows ignite upon release, leaving a trail of fire as they fly towards their target. With a heart as fierce as the flames she commands, Rowena seeks revenge for her fallen tribe, unleashing her wrath upon those who wronged her.

champions.name: Thalia
champions.metaDescription: Thalia, the Huntress of the Wind, is as untamable as the breeze itself. She moves silently through the forests, her arrows flying faster than the wind. A master of stealth, Thalia’s bow sings with the whisper of the winds, striking down enemies before they can sense her presence.

champions.name: Naida
champions.metaDescription: Naida, the Water Huntress, is a fierce protector of rivers and lakes. With eyes as deep as the ocean, she navigates through her watery domain with unmatched agility. Her arrows flow like streams, always finding their mark, and she uses the tides to cloak herself from those who dare trespass her waters.

champions.name: Kaliya
champions.metaDescription: Kaliya, the Hydra of Light, is a celestial guardian who uses her radiant scales to blind her enemies. She is said to have been born from the heavens to protect sacred lands, and her multiple heads weave together beams of light, purging evil from the realm with her divine wrath.

champions.name: Tiamat
champions.metaDescription: The mother of all Hydras, Tiamat is an ancient being of chaos and destruction. Her heads each possess different dark powers, and her influence spreads corruption wherever she roams. Worshiped by dark cults, Tiamat’s very existence threatens the balance of the world, as she yearns to drown it in eternal night.

champions.name: Ladon
champions.metaDescription: Ladon, the Fire Hydra, is a creature born from the heart of a volcano, with multiple serpentine heads that spew molten lava. Her very presence can set entire forests ablaze, and her regenerative abilities make her nearly indestructible. Each head strikes with the ferocity of an erupting volcano, engulfing her enemies in firestorms.

champions.name: Shesha
champions.metaDescription: Shesha, the Wind Hydra, is a mythical creature with heads that stretch to the sky like serpents of the storm. Each head can summon gales, tornados, and lightning, making Shesha a living tempest. When one head is severed, the winds regrow it twice as fierce, ensuring her wrath is endless.

champions.name: Yamata
champions.metaDescription: Yamata, the water-born Hydra, rules the depths of the ocean. With three serpent heads that control the tides, she commands the waves to rise and crush her enemies. Each head spits forth torrents of water, drowning foes in an endless deluge, ensuring no enemy escapes her watery grasp.

champions.name: Tian Long
champions.metaDescription: Tian Long, the radiant Kirin of light, is a symbol of wisdom and justice. His shimmering scales reflect the brilliance of the heavens, and his presence brings peace to the lands he protects. As a guardian of the light, he ensures that hope never fades, even in the darkest times.

champions.name: Tatsu
champions.metaDescription: Tatsu, the shadowy Kirin, is a mysterious figure that roams the twilight realms between life and death. His dark scales shimmer like starlight on a moonless night, and his power to control the darkness makes him a force of terror. Legends speak of him as a protector of forbidden knowledge, guarding the secrets of the underworld.

champions.name: Jormungandr
champions.metaDescription: Ifrit, the blazing Kirin of fire, is a mythical beast dragon. His fiery mane and molten scales radiate intense heat, and wherever he walks, the ground beneath him ignites in flame. Revered as both a destroyer and a purifier, Ifrit’s flames are said to burn away corruption and cleanse the land.

champions.name: Seiryu
champions.metaDescription: Seiryu, the azure Kirin of the winds, is as swift and untamable as the skies themselves. Known for his grace and speed, he commands the wind to guide his path, vanishing like a breeze before enemies can react. His power is a whirlwind, both elegant and deadly.

champions.name: Ryujin
champions.metaDescription: The great sea dragon, Ryujin, is a mythical Kirin who rules over the oceans and controls the tides. As a protector of the deep, he is both revered and feared by sailors and sea creatures alike. His presence can either calm the wildest storms or summon them at his whim, as he maintains balance in the watery realms.

champions.name: Artemis
champions.metaDescription: Artemis, the Magic Archer of Light, is a figure of purity and grace. Her arrows shine with divine brilliance, guided by celestial forces to strike down evil. As a guardian of the skies, her aim never falters, and her arrows bring both protection to the innocent and destruction to those who threaten the light.

champions.name: Hecate
champions.metaDescription: Hecate, the Dark Magic Archer, wields an enchanted bow that shoots arrows imbued with shadows and nightmares. She is a master of illusions, luring her enemies into darkness before striking with deadly accuracy. Hecate’s arrows not only pierce flesh but also sap the willpower of her foes, leaving them defenseless against her next attack.

champions.name: Hestial
champions.metaDescription: Hestial, the Magic Archer of Fire, draws her strength from the burning flames within her soul. Every arrow she fires is engulfed in flames, leaving a trail of fire in its wake. She thrives in the heat of battle, lighting up the night sky with the fury of her flaming bow.

champions.name: Rhiannon
champions.metaDescription: Rhiannon, the Wind Magic Archer, channels the power of the storm through her bow. With every shot, her arrows are carried by fierce gusts, capable of cutting down entire battalions. Known as a force of nature, she strikes swiftly and without warning, her enemies left scattered in the winds.

champions.name: Selene
champions.metaDescription: Selene, the Magic Archer of Water, draws her power from the moonlit seas. Her arrows shimmer with the reflection of the ocean’s surface, moving as fluidly as the tides. Each shot calls upon the strength of the seas, overwhelming her enemies with waves of pure, unrelenting force.

champions.name: Nuwa
champions.metaDescription: Nuwa, the Light Medusa, was once a goddess of creation, now cursed to bear the serpents upon her head. Despite her curse, she uses her powers of light to heal and protect, turning her enemies to stone only when necessary. Her wisdom and grace are her greatest strengths, guiding the lost towards redemption.

champions.name: Lamia
champions.metaDescription: Lamia, the Dark Medusa, was born from the abyss, a creature of darkness summoned to guard the secrets of the night. Her serpents, infused with shadow, writhe with a hunger for the souls of the living, and her gaze turns those who meet it into eternal stone.

champions.name: Gorgon
champions.metaDescription: Gorgon, the Fire Medusa, is a creature of terrifying beauty, her hair ablaze with serpents that spit flames. Her gaze incinerates those foolish enough to challenge her, turning them to ash. Driven by rage, she uses her fiery power to guard the secrets of ancient lands.

champions.name: Medusa
champions.metaDescription: Medusa of the Wind is a swift and deadly huntress. Her serpentine hair lashes out like the wind, striking down foes with deadly precision. Born from a curse, she moves faster than the eye can see, her gaze leaving nothing but statues in her wake, scattered across the landscape like forgotten memories.

champions.name: Naga
champions.metaDescription: Naga, the Water Medusa, emerges from the darkest depths of the ocean. Her serpents weave together, creating whirlpools and floods that trap her enemies. Her gaze turns foes into statues of coral, leaving them forever lost in the deep. Naga is the queen of the abyss, ruling her kingdom of drowned souls.

champions.name: Ravos
champions.metaDescription: A towering warrior of the labyrinths, Ravos is the last of the noble Light Minotaurs. Blessed with unmatched strength, he fights to defend the sacred temples from invaders, wielding his mighty axe and guiding lost souls through the maze with honor and courage.

champions.name: Zarok
champions.metaDescription: Zarok, the Dark Minotaur, is a towering brute who serves as the enforcer of an ancient evil. His dark horns drip with the blood of his enemies, and his massive axe cleaves through armor with ease. Zarok’s rage is legendary, and once unleashed, nothing can stop his rampage through the battlefield.

champions.name: Infernox
champions.metaDescription: Infernox, the Fire Minotaur, is a towering beast forged in the heart of a volcano. His molten skin is impervious to harm, and his war hammer ignites with each swing. Infernox charges into battle with the fury of an erupting volcano, leaving only scorched earth in his path.

champions.name: Vortok
champions.metaDescription: Vortok is a Minotaur warrior with the fury of a cyclone. Known for his brutal strength and quick reflexes, he can charge through enemy lines like a whirlwind. Vortok’s battle axe, imbued with the power of the wind, cleaves through armor and bone with ease, leaving only devastation in his wake.

champions.name: Astarok
champions.metaDescription: Astarok, the Sea Minotaur, roams the underwater labyrinths, protecting ancient relics and ruins lost to time. His strength is unmatched beneath the waves, and his battle hammer strikes like the crushing force of the ocean depths. Sailors speak in hushed tones of the sea beast who guards the treasures of the deep.

champions.name: Miho
champions.metaDescription: Miho, the NineTail Fox of Light, is a mythical creature of elegance and mystery. Each of her nine tails glows with the radiance of the stars, and she uses her celestial powers to protect her allies and blind her enemies. Known for her wisdom, Miho’s enchanting beauty hides her immense strength.

champions.name: Daji
champions.metaDescription: Daji, the Nine-Tailed Fox of Shadows, is a master of deception and allure. Her tails shimmer with dark magic, allowing her to bend reality and manipulate the minds of her victims. Daji’s beauty hides her sinister nature, and she revels in the destruction and chaos she spreads, leaving broken souls in her wake.

champions.name: Tamamo
champions.metaDescription: Tamamo, the Nine-Tailed Fox of Fire, is a trickster spirit with a fierce and fiery nature. Her tails, each representing a different flame, give her the ability to manipulate fire in myriad ways. She can incinerate her foes or mesmerize them with her fiery beauty, always keeping her enemies guessing.

champions.name: Oinari
champions.metaDescription: Oinari, the NineTail Fox of Wind, is a trickster spirit who commands the very winds themselves. Her laughter echoes in the breeze, and her enemies are often struck before they even realize she is near. With her nine tails whipping through the air, Oinari dances across the battlefield, swift and untouchable.

champions.name: Huli Jing
champions.metaDescription: Huli Jing, the Nine-Tailed Fox of Water, is a cunning trickster spirit who dances through the misty shores, using her charm to ensnare unsuspecting sailors. With a flick of her tails, she conjures illusions of tranquil waters, luring her victims into a false sense of security before unleashing powerful currents to drag them beneath the waves.

champions.name: Aetheria
champions.metaDescription: Aetheria, the Light Dryad, is the embodiment of nature’s purity. She resides in the heart of enchanted forests, her very presence nurturing the land and revitalizing the plants around her. With a heart full of compassion, Aetheria uses her powers to heal her allies, mending wounds and restoring hope in even the most dire situations.

champions.name: Orphne
champions.metaDescription: Orphne, the Dark Nymph, is a shadowy wraith who thrives in the depths of forgotten forests, weaving nightmares from the fears of lost souls. With her haunting whispers, she lures the unsuspecting into her web of darkness, where hope is extinguished and despair reigns. As a guardian of the forsaken, she revels in chaos, her very presence a chilling reminder of the abyss that lurks within every heart.

champions.name: Pyra
champions.metaDescription: Pyra, the Fire Dryad, is a fierce protector of the forest. Born from the flames of ancient wildfires, she uses her fiery magic to cleanse the land of evil. Pyra's wrath burns hotter than the sun, and she wields flames as an extension of her will. Though dangerous, her fire also brings new growth to the ashes of the old.

champions.name: Meliae
champions.metaDescription: Meliae, the Storm Dryad, is the embodiment of nature’s fury. She commands thunder and lightning, her roots deep in the earth while her spirit soars with the storms. Known to unleash tempests upon those who seek to harm her forests, Meliae’s rage can summon hurricanes that devastate entire landscapes.

champions.name: Merope
champions.metaDescription: Merope, the Water Dryad, is the gentle guardian of lakes and rivers. Her presence is like a ripple on the water, calm yet powerful. With every step, she brings life to the land, her magic restoring the vitality of the forests that depend on her serene strength. Merope can summon floods to protect her sacred groves.

champions.name: Gulmok
champions.metaDescription: Gulmok, the Light Orc, is an unlikely hero who turned away from his tribe’s brutal ways. He now leads with honor, using his immense strength to protect the innocent. His loyalty to the light is unshakable, and in battle, Gulmok’s radiant axe shines with the power of justice, cutting through the darkness that threatens his people.

champions.name: Azog
champions.metaDescription: Azog, the ruthless warlord of the Dark Orcs, is a terror on the battlefield. Leading his clan with brutal strength, he seeks to expand his dominion over all lands. His battle axe, stained with the blood of countless foes, strikes fear into the hearts of his enemies, as his ambition knows no bounds.

champions.name: Grommash
champions.metaDescription: Grommash, the Fire Orc, is a warlord feared across the land. His blood burns with the rage of a thousand battles, and his warhammer ignites the very ground he treads. With an insatiable hunger for conquest, Grommash leads his tribe through fire and fury, leaving nothing but ashes in his wake.

champions.name: Morgoth
champions.metaDescription: Morgoth, the Wind Orc, is a cunning and agile warrior who uses the wind to his advantage. He moves faster than his enemies can react, striking with deadly precision and vanishing like a gust. Known as the "Whispering Blade," Morgoth’s speed is unmatched, and his enemies fear the breeze that heralds his approach.

champions.name: Grimgor
champions.metaDescription: Grimgor, the Water Orc, is a brutal warlord who commands legions of orcs from the swampy shores. His massive frame is covered in barnacles and algae, and his trident strikes with the force of a crashing wave. Grimgor’s dominance over the waters makes him a fearsome enemy, as his forces rise from the depths to overwhelm his foes.

champions.name: Jujak
champions.metaDescription: Jujak, the Phoenix of Light, is a symbol of rebirth and hope. With each dawn, she rises from her own ashes, bringing light to the darkest corners of the world. Her brilliant feathers glow with the warmth of the sun, and her tears have the power to heal. Jujak soars high, a beacon of purity and renewal.

champions.name: Eclipse
champions.metaDescription: Eclipse, the Dark Phoenix, rises not with light but with shadow. Her flames are black as night, consuming all in their path. Born from the ashes of destruction, Eclipse is a harbinger of endings, and her rebirth brings with it the nightfall of civilizations. Her enemies fall into eternal darkness as her wings blot out the stars.

champions.name: Zhuque
champions.metaDescription: Zhuque, the fiery Phoenix, rises from the ashes of ancient wars to reignite hope in times of despair. Her flame burns eternal, representing life, death, and rebirth. As the embodiment of fiery passion, she spreads her wings to engulf enemies in a blaze of purifying fire.

champions.name: Suzaku
champions.metaDescription: Suzaku, the Phoenix of Wind, controls the very air with her graceful wings. Her presence stirs the heavens, and the winds bend to her will. Known as the Phoenix of the Southern Sky, Suzaku’s fiery windstorms can level mountains and scatter armies. Wherever she flies, the wind whispers of change and freedom.

champions.name: Fenghuang
champions.metaDescription: Fenghuang, the Water Phoenix, rises from the oceans, her body gleaming like the surface of a serene lake. A mythical guardian of the seas, her cool flames can extinguish even the fiercest of fires. Fenghuang’s song can calm the wildest of storms, and her presence brings balance and peace to the waters she protects.

champions.name: Alaric
champions.metaDescription: Alaric, the Light Priest, is a beacon of hope in times of despair. He channels the divine power of the heavens, healing the wounded and protecting his allies with radiant shields. Alaric’s unwavering faith in the light has led him through countless battles, and his prayers can call down the very forces of the heavens to smite evil.

champions.name: Erebos
champions.metaDescription: Erebos, the Dark Priest, serves as a conduit between the living and the dead. His rituals summon spirits from beyond the veil, and he uses the power of death to strengthen his allies and weaken his foes. Cloaked in shadows, Erebos wields necromantic forces, thriving in darkness where others fear to tread.

champions.name: Theron
champions.metaDescription: Theron, the Fire Priest, channels the divine flames of his god to smite his enemies. His faith burns as brightly as his pyres, and in battle, he is an unstoppable force of righteous fire. Theron’s flames purify all they touch, cleansing the world of evil while empowering those who fight by his side.

champions.name: Magnus
champions.metaDescription: Magnus, the Wind Priest, is a wanderer who communes with the spirits of the air. He uses the wind to spread his prayers, his chants carried across the skies. With a flick of his hand, he can summon tornadoes or gentle breezes to aid his allies, and his magic binds the power of the wind to his divine will.

champions.name: Casimir
champions.metaDescription: Casimir, the Water Priest, draws his strength from the sacred springs of the world. His prayers are like ripples in the water, calming those who hear them and washing away the pain of battle. With the power of water at his command, Casimir heals the wounded and cleanses the land, a soothing presence amid the chaos of war.

champions.name: Azrael
champions.metaDescription: Azrael, the Light Reaper, is a being of mercy and grace. Tasked with guiding souls to the afterlife, he wields a scythe of pure light, delivering swift and painless ends. Azrael is both feared and revered, for though he is the harbinger of death, his presence offers peace and salvation to the suffering.

champions.name: Mot
champions.metaDescription: Mot, the Dark Reaper, is the personification of death itself. His scythe reaps not only life but hope as well, leaving despair in his wake. Cloaked in shadows, he travels the land, claiming the souls of the damned. Mot’s very presence brings a chilling finality, and those who face him know there is no escape from his cold embrace.

champions.name: Yama
champions.metaDescription: Yama, the Fire Reaper, is a harbinger of death who carries a burning scythe that incinerates the souls of the damned. He rules over the infernal realms, where he judges those who have committed grievous sins. His fiery presence is feared in all realms, for wherever Yama treads, death and flame are sure to follow.

champions.name: Pesta
champions.metaDescription: Pesta, the Wind Reaper, is a spectral figure who brings plagues and pestilence in his wake. He rides the winds like a phantom, wielding his scythe to spread disease with every swing. Where Pesta travels, crops wither, and sickness spreads, leaving desolation behind him as he claims the lives of those who cannot withstand his deadly gusts.

champions.name: Shinigami
champions.metaDescription: Shinigami, the Water Reaper, emerges from the depths of the ocean, a spectral figure draped in flowing robes that ripple like the waves. As the guardian of the tides, he navigates the currents of fate, guiding souls lost at sea to their final resting place. His presence brings a sense of calm, yet those who linger too long in his domain may find themselves drawn into the depths,

champions.name: Yumi
champions.metaDescription: Yumi is a warrior of grace and discipline, a samurai devoted to the path of the light. Her katana glows with divine energy as she fights to uphold justice. Yumi’s honor and loyalty are unwavering, and in battle, she is a beacon of hope, cutting through darkness with every precise strike.

champions.name: Rei
champions.metaDescription: Rei is a fallen samurai, once noble but now consumed by the shadows. She wields her blade with a deadly elegance, her heart hardened by betrayal. As a servant of darkness, Rei's strikes are silent and swift, her presence a harbinger of doom to those who stand in her way.

champions.name: Akane
champions.metaDescription: Akane, the Fire Samurai, fights with a blazing fury that mirrors her inner flame. Her sword ignites with every swing, turning her enemies to ashes in an instant. Akane's passion for battle drives her forward, and her relentless spirit burns brighter with each fight she wins.

champions.name: Kazuha
champions.metaDescription: Kazuha moves like the wind itself, swift and elusive. Her katana cuts through the air with the speed of a tempest, and no opponent can catch her off guard. Kazuha’s mastery of wind techniques allows her to vanish and reappear in the blink of an eye, striking foes before they even sense her presence.

champions.name: Hana
champions.metaDescription: Hana, the Water Samurai, fights with a calm yet unyielding spirit. Her blade flows like a river, adapting to every battle she faces. Hana’s strength lies in her patience and precision, and she strikes only when the moment is right, her katana as fluid and deadly as the waters she commands.

champions.name: Aurora
champions.metaDescription: Unlike most of her kind, Aurora uses her otherworldly beauty and charm to heal and uplift rather than corrupt. She draws power from the stars, guiding lost souls to redemption. Her presence brings warmth and solace to those who seek hope in the darkest of times.

champions.name: Siren
champions.metaDescription: Siren, the Dark Succubus, is a seductress who lures her victims into eternal darkness with her enchanting song. Her beauty is matched only by her cruelty, as she feeds on the life force of those who fall under her spell. In the shadows, Siren is both temptress and executioner.

champions.name: Lilith
champions.metaDescription: Lilith is a Succubus who thrives on chaos and passion, her fiery allure impossible to resist. With flames in her eyes and heart, she burns her enemies from within, turning desire into destruction. Her touch ignites both love and devastation, leaving scorched souls in her wake.

champions.name: Rusalka
champions.metaDescription: Rusalka dances through the air, her charm as fleeting as the wind. She seduces with her whispers, bending the minds of those who hear her. Rusalka uses her wind magic to suffocate her enemies, her laughter echoing like the breeze as she drains them of life.

champions.name: Yuki Onna
champions.metaDescription: Yuki Onna, the Water Succubus, is as cold as the winter frost. She appears as a vision of icy beauty, but her embrace chills the soul. Yuki Onna freezes the hearts of her victims, trapping them in a frozen dream from which there is no escape. Her beauty conceals her deadly nature.

champions.name: Solarius
champions.metaDescription: Solarius, the Dragon of Light, is a majestic and ancient creature revered as a symbol of hope and divine power. His scales shine with the brilliance of the sun, and his radiant breath purges darkness from the land. Solarius soars through the heavens, guarding the world from evil and inspiring all who gaze upon his blinding light.

champions.name: Nidhogg
champions.metaDescription: Nidhogg, the Dragon of Darkness, is a monstrous and terrifying being that dwells deep within the abyss. Feared by all, Nidhogg consumes the souls of the damned and spreads chaos wherever he flies. His shadowy wings blot out the sun, and his black flames leave nothing but destruction in their wake. Nidhogg's only goal is to plunge the world into eternal night.

champions.name: Ignatius
champions.metaDescription: Ignatius, the Fire Dragon, is a massive beast forged from the heart of a volcano. His body is covered in molten rock, and rivers of lava flow beneath his fiery scales. With each breath, Ignatius can unleash torrents of flame that consume everything in their path. He is destruction incarnate, and wherever he flies, the land is left in ruins.

champions.name: Ember
champions.metaDescription: Galeon is a Wind Dragon who soars through the skies with unmatched speed and grace. His wings stir the winds, creating powerful storms that sweep across the land. Galeon’s fiery breath and agile movements make him a dangerous opponent, as he can strike from the clouds and disappear just as quickly, leaving his foes bewildered by the tempest he controls.

champions.name: Aquarius
champions.metaDescription: Aquarius, the Water Dragon, reigns over the deep oceans, where he manipulates the currents and commands the creatures of the sea. His sapphire-blue scales blend with the waters, making him nearly invisible beneath the waves. Aquarius is a creature of both serenity and wrath, defending his underwater kingdom with the force of a thousand crashing waves.

champions.name: Brynhild
champions.metaDescription: A warrior of legend, Brynhild descends from the heavens, riding on beams of light. She is a Valkyrie who selects the worthy fallen and carries them to Valhalla. With her spear gleaming with divine power, she fights with the grace and ferocity of a goddess, a protector of the righteous.

champions.name: Helga
champions.metaDescription: Helga, once a revered Valkyrie, turned to the dark arts after forsaking her oath to the gods. Now leading a legion of fallen warriors, she descends upon battlefields like a raven in the night, collecting the souls of the damned for her dark master. Her spear is as swift as the winds, bringing swift death to all in her path.

champions.name: Freya
champions.metaDescription: Freya, the Fire Valkyrie, is a warrior goddess who rides into battle on wings of flame. With her fiery sword in hand, she leads the charge against the forces of darkness, her presence inspiring courage in the hearts of her allies. Freya’s battle cries echo like thunder, and her fury burns as brightly as the sun.

champions.name: Sigrdrífa
champions.metaDescription: Sigrdrífa, the Valkyrie of the Wind, sweeps through the battlefield like a storm, guiding the souls of fallen warriors to their eternal rest. Her wings, made of storm clouds, allow her to soar above her enemies, striking them down with her lightning-infused spear. She is the storm given form, a force of nature that none can withstand.

champions.name: Arina
champions.metaDescription: Arina is a Valkyrie of the seas, blessed by the ocean’s power. She moves with the grace of the waves, slicing through enemies with fluid precision. Arina's deep connection to the water allows her to heal her allies and protect the shores from invaders, making her a fierce and compassionate warrior.

champions.name: Morgana
champions.metaDescription: Morgana, the Light Vampire, walks the line between darkness and redemption. She feeds on the energy of evil beings, using their power to fuel her quest for justice. Morgana's ethereal beauty hides her deadly nature, but her light-filled heart strives to balance the thirst for blood with her desire to protect the innocent.

champions.name: Carmilla
champions.metaDescription: Carmilla is a true creature of the night, a Vampire who revels in the darkness. With her eternal beauty and seductive charm, she preys on the weak, draining their life force to strengthen her dark reign. Carmilla is a cunning and manipulative queen of shadows, ruling with an iron grip over her undead minions.

champions.name: Patayon
champions.metaDescription: Patayon, the Fire Vampire, is as fiery as the flames that surround her. Her hunger for power is insatiable, and she scorches everything in her path to feed her thirst for blood. With every victim she claims, Patayon’s flames burn brighter, and her reign of terror spreads like wildfire across the land.

champions.name: Valeria
champions.metaDescription: Valeria is a Wind Vampire who moves with the grace of a breeze, swift and silent. Her wings allow her to soar through the night, hunting her prey from above. Valeria’s bite is as cold as the wind she commands, and those who fall to her charms are carried away on the winds of death.

champions.name: Anastasia
champions.metaDescription: Anastasia, the Water Vampire, thrives in the shadows of the deep. Her allure is as cold and unforgiving as the ocean’s depths, and she pulls her victims into the abyss, where they are never seen again. Anastasia’s control over water makes her a deadly foe, using the waves to sweep her enemies into her watery lair.

champions.name: Aric
champions.metaDescription: Aric, the Warrior of Light, is a noble knight who fights with unwavering courage. His sword shines with the brilliance of the sun, and he leads his comrades into battle with honor. Aric’s heart is pure, and his strength is unmatched, making him a beacon of hope in times of despair.

champions.name: Ragnar
champions.metaDescription: Ragnar, the Dark Warrior, is a battle-hardened warlord who knows no mercy. Once a hero, he fell into darkness after losing everything he loved. Now, he fights for vengeance, wielding his sword with a brutal efficiency that leaves nothing but ruin in his wake.

champions.name: Darius
champions.metaDescription: Darius is a warrior of unrelenting fury, his blade burning with the heat of a thousand battles. He fights with the ferocity of a raging inferno, and his enemies are consumed by his flames. Darius is driven by his passion for victory, and nothing can stand in his way as he charges headlong into the fray.

champions.name: Maximus
champions.metaDescription: Maximus is a free-spirited warrior whose connection to the wind grants him unparalleled speed and agility in battle. His twin blades move as fast as a gale, cutting through enemies before they can even react. Maximus' loyalty to his comrades is as strong as the wind that guides him, and his fighting style is a dance of grace and power.

champions.name: Thorin
champions.metaDescription: Thorin, the Warrior of Water, is as relentless as the tides. His mastery over the element allows him to channel the power of rivers and seas, making him an unstoppable force in combat. Thorin’s strength flows like water, adaptable and indomitable, and he fights to protect his homeland from invaders who seek to corrupt its purity.

champions.name: Garou
champions.metaDescription: Garou, the Light Werewolf, is a noble protector of the forest and its creatures. Under the light of the full moon, he transforms into a mighty beast, using his enhanced strength and senses to guard the innocent. Though feared for his lupine form, Garou is a hero at heart, always fighting for justice in a world of darkness.

champions.name: Varcolac
champions.metaDescription: Varcolac, the cursed Werewolf, is a creature of the night who prowls the darkest forests, hunting by moonlight. His savage strength is only matched by his feral intelligence, and he revels in the terror he spreads. Varcolac serves the dark forces, eagerly awaiting the next full moon when his powers reach their peak.

champions.name: Lycan
champions.metaDescription: Lycan, the Fire Werewolf, is a ferocious beast driven by primal rage. His fur burns with the intensity of his inner flames, and his claws leave fiery trails with every swipe. Consumed by his desire for power, Lycan hunts under the full moon, setting the night ablaze with his relentless fury as he seeks to expand his fiery domain.

champions.name: Vilkacis
champions.metaDescription: Vilkacis, the Wind Werewolf, is a swift and agile predator, moving with the speed of a gale. His howls can summon storms, and he uses the wind to cloak his movements, striking from the shadows before vanishing without a trace. Known as the "Wind Stalker," Vilkacis leaves his enemies in a state of panic as they are hunted by an unseen predator.

champions.name: Wulver
champions.metaDescription: Wulver is a mysterious creature who stalks the misty shores, his presence heralded by the sound of crashing waves. This Water Werewolf commands the tides, using the power of the ocean to wash away his enemies. Wulver is both protector and predator, safeguarding his pack while hunting those who dare trespass into his waters.

champions.name: Xi Wangmu
champions.metaDescription: Xi Wangmu, the Light Witch, is an ancient sorceress who governs the magic of immortality and the forces of nature. Her wisdom spans millennia, and she wields the power to bestow life or take it away with a single spell. Known as the "Queen Mother of the West," Xi Wangmu’s magic can heal or destroy, depending on the balance of the world.

champions.name: Aradia
champions.metaDescription: Aradia, the Dark Witch, is a master of forbidden magic and ancient curses. She draws her power from the shadows, casting spells that manipulate the minds and souls of her enemies. Aradia’s dark allure and cunning nature make her a feared sorceress, and those who cross her path often find themselves caught in webs of despair and eternal torment.

champions.name: Circe
champions.metaDescription: Circe, the Fire Witch, weaves flames into spells that can twist reality itself. A master of dark sorcery, she manipulates both fire and mind, casting illusions that burn her enemies’ sanity. Her enchanting beauty hides a dangerous and vengeful heart, making her a feared and unpredictable force on the battlefield.

champions.name: Pontianak
champions.metaDescription: Pontianak is a vengeful Wind Witch who rides on the howling gales, seeking revenge on those who wronged her in life. Her screams can summon storms, and her wrath is as relentless as the winds she controls. She lures her enemies with a haunting beauty, only to unleash her fury upon them when they least expect it.

champions.name: Leizu
champions.metaDescription: Leizu, the Water Witch, commands the power of the oceans, using the ebb and flow of the tides to fuel her spells. Her magic is as mysterious and unpredictable as the deep sea, and she is known for summoning powerful tidal waves and whirlpools to vanquish her enemies. Leizu’s wisdom is as vast as the ocean, and her serene exterior hides a formidable force.

champions.name: Woochi
champions.metaDescription: A trickster wizard with a heart of gold, Woochi is a master of illusions and light magic. He travels the world, using his spells to outwit enemies and protect those in need. With a playful grin, he brings joy and laughter wherever he goes, but his powers should never be underestimated, as he can bend light itself to his will.

champions.name: Ahriman
champions.metaDescription: Ahriman, the Dark Wizard, is a master of forbidden magic, weaving curses and hexes into his spells. His thirst for power knows no bounds, and he seeks to dominate both the living and the dead with his sorcery. Ahriman’s knowledge of ancient, dark rituals makes him one of the most feared wizards, and even the bravest hesitate to face him.

champions.name: Hermes
champions.metaDescription: Hermes, the Fire Wizard, is a master of arcane fire magic, wielding flames that can scorch mountains and ignite the sky. With his fiery staff in hand, Hermes channels his power into devastating spells that consume all in their path. His intellect and mastery over fire make him a dangerous adversary, but his true strength lies in his unwavering confidence and quick thinking in battle.

champions.name: Taliesin
champions.metaDescription: Taliesin, the Wind Wizard, is a legendary bard and sorcerer, whose mastery of the winds allows him to summon storms with his music. His songs can calm tempests or stir hurricanes, and his enchanting melodies control the elements around him. With a playful spirit and a sharp wit, Taliesin weaves his magic through both battle and song.

champions.name: Merlin
champions.metaDescription: Merlin, the Water Wizard, is a master of arcane knowledge and elemental magic. He controls the flow of rivers, the pull of tides, and the depths of the ocean itself. His calm demeanor hides the vast power he wields, as he uses water’s fluidity and strength to shape the world around him, bending it to his will.

champions.name: Merlin
champions.metaDescription: Merlin, the Water Wizard, is a master of arcane knowledge and elemental magic. He controls the flow of rivers, the pull of tides, and the depths of the ocean itself. His calm demeanor hides the vast power he wields, as he uses water’s fluidity and strength to shape the world around him, bending it to his will.

His calm demeanor hides the vast power he wields, as he uses water’s fluidity and strength to shape the world around him, bending it to his will.

His calm demeanor hides the vast power he wields, as he uses water’s fluidity and strength to shape the world around him, bending it to his will.

His calm demeanor hides the vast power he wields, as he uses water’s fluidity and strength to shape the world around him, bending it to his will.

His calm demeanor hides the vast power he wields, as he uses water’s fluidity and strength to shape the world around him, bending it to his will.

traits.desc: Once your team loses 50% of their Health, Galio is summoned, slamming into the largest cluster of enemies and Stunning them. Galio's strength increases based on total star level of all active Cultists.

items.name: Jin Jia
items.desc:
The real name of the Monkey King's armor, as described in the classic Chinese novel "Journey to the West," is the "Golden Chainmail Armor" (金锁甲, Jīn Suǒ Jiǎ). This is the armor that Sun Wukong receives from the Dragon King of the Eastern Seas, and it is one of the key elements of his legendary appearance. 
A shorter name for the Monkey King's armor could be "Golden Mail" (金甲, Jīn Jiǎ). This name keeps the essence of the original while being more concise.

items.name: Jingong
items.desc: A fitting short name for a mythical Monkey King helmet could be "Jingong" (金箍), which translates to "Golden Circlet" or "Golden Band." This name is inspired by the legendary headband worn by the Monkey King, Sun Wukong, in Chinese mythology. The name "Jingong" encapsulates the essence of the Monkey King's cunning, strength, and transformative abilities. Would you like a description or backstory for this helmet?

items.name: Ruyi Bang
items.desc: Ruyi Bang (如意棒) is a magical staff whose name means "As You Wish Staff." The term Ruyi (如意) signifies the staff's ability to change size and shape according to the wielder's desires, while Bang (棒) refers to its basic form as a staff or cudgel. This weapon, central to the legendary Monkey King, embodies versatility and power, adapting to any situation with ease.

items.name: Osirian
items.desc: Osirian is a powerful and evocative name for armor, drawing directly from Osiris, the ancient Egyptian god of the afterlife, resurrection, and eternal life. The name suggests armor that offers not only physical protection but also a deep connection to immortality, wisdom, and the divine power of Osiris.

items.name: Sekhem
items.desc: The Sekhem Helmet is a legendary artifact in ancient Egyptian mythology, believed to have been crafted by the gods themselves and imbued with the very essence of Sekhem—the life force and divine power that flows through all living beings. The helmet was said to have been worn by a pharaoh chosen by the gods to lead his people through times of great peril. This pharaoh, who was known for his unmatched wisdom and strength, was given the Sekhem Helmet as a symbol of his divine right to rule and protect his kingdom.

items.name: Eye of Ra
items.desc: The Eye of Ra is a potent symbol in ancient Egyptian mythology, representing the powerful and protective force of the sun god Ra. Often depicted as an all-seeing eye, the Eye of Ra is associated with divine authority, wrath, and protection.

items.name: Wygar
items.desc: Wygar is a name that appears in some Arthurian legends, particularly in connection with the legendary armor of King Arthur. Wygar In Layamon, the name of Arthur's hauberk (armoured tunic).

items.name: Pendragon’s Crown
items.desc: The Pendragon’s Crown is a legendary helmet said to have been worn by the ancient kings of Britain, long before the time of Arthur. This helmet was crafted by the gods themselves, forged in the heart of a dying star and cooled in the sacred waters of Avalon. It was passed down through the Pendragon line, symbolizing the divine right to rule and the protection of the land.

items.name: Silver Bullet
items.desc: While not originally from English mythology, the concept of the silver bullet, often associated with werewolves and other supernatural creatures, has been adopted into English folklore and literature. The silver bullet is often depicted as a mystical weapon that can kill otherwise invincible beings.

items.name: Aegis
items.desc: The Aegis is a breastplate or shield used by Zeus and his daughter Athena in Greek Mythology. It is featured in the Iliad by Homer, in which it is used by both Athena and lent to Apollo. The Aegis is said to have been created from the hide of the Aix, a Gorgon slayed by Zeus during the Battle of the Titans

items.name: Kunee
items.desc: The Helm of Hades is a powerful artifact that was said to have been crafted by the Cyclopes and given to Hades, the god of the underworld, during the Titanomachy, the war between the Titans and the Olympian gods.

items.name: Aetheris
items.desc: "Aetheris" is derived from "Aether," the personification of the upper sky and heavens in Greek mythology, often associated with light and pure air. The name reflects the staff's celestial and mystical nature, with the gemstone channeling the ethereal power of the skies.

items.name: Kavacha
items.desc: the armor of Karna that was granted to him by his father Surya at birth. (Hindu mythology)

items.name: Kiriti
items.desc: Arjuna, one of the Pandava brothers and the hero of the Mahabharata, is often depicted wearing a divine helmet called Kiriti. This helmet was a gift from the god Indra, who was Arjuna’s divine father. The Kiriti was not only a symbol of Arjuna’s royal lineage and divine favor but also provided him with protection and an aura of invincibility in battle.

items.name: Nandaka
items.desc: The legendary sword of Lord Vishnu, known for its divine power and ability to cut through evil.

items.name: Tengu Yoroi
items.desc: Tengu-no-Yoroi (Armor of the Tengu): This mythical armor is said to have been worn by the Tengu, legendary bird-like creatures. The armor was believed to grant the wearer immense strength and agility.

items.name: Kaminari
items.desc: Takeda Shingen, another legendary samurai warlord, is famous for his armor and kabuto. His helmet often featured a fearsome design, including antlers or other large crests, symbolizing his power and strategic brilliance.

items.name: Raikiri
items.desc: Raikiri (雷切) translates to "Lightning Cutter" or "Thunder Cutter." It is a legendary sword name that originated from a story about the famous samurai and swordsman, Tachibana Dōsetsu. According to the legend, Dōsetsu once used his sword to cut through a lightning bolt that struck a tree, hence earning the sword its name, Raikiri.

items.name: Evalach
items.desc: The Shield of Evalach is a legendary artifact steeped in Arthurian lore, known for its association with divine protection and the purity of Sir Galahad, one of the most virtuous knights of the Round Table.

items.name: Eaglewing
items.desc: Eaglewing is a formidable knight helmet, inspired by the grace and strength of an eagle. Its sleek, metallic design is accented by curved, wing-like extensions on either side, evoking both a sense of protection and aerodynamic agility.

items.name: Excalibur
items.desc: Excalibur is the legendary sword of King Arthur, symbolizing his rightful sovereignty and unparalleled power. In Arthurian legend, it is either pulled from a stone or given by the Lady of the Lake. Excalibur is known for its unbreakable blade and magical scabbard, making it one of the most iconic symbols in mythology.

items.name: Gaya Armor
items.desc: Gaya armor refers to the protective gear used by the Gaya Confederacy, a collection of city-states in ancient Korea that existed from around the 1st to the 6th century CE.

items.name: Nightfang
items.desc: Nightfang is a powerful name for armor, evoking the stealth, strength, and ferocity of a wolf hunting under the cover of darkness. It suggests protection that is both swift and lethal, ideal for a warrior who moves like a shadow and strikes with precision.

items.name: Eagle Bonnet
items.desc: The Bonnet is a traditional headdress worn by leaders and warriors, particularly among the Plains tribes, such as the Lakota, Sioux, and Cheyenne. It is made from eagle feathers and is often decorated with beads, quills, and other symbolic materials. Each feather in a War Bonnet represents an act of bravery or a significant achievement, making the headdress a powerful symbol of honor and respect.

items.name: RedHorn
items.desc: #N/A

items.name: Bayan
items.desc: Babr-e Bayan is a legendary armor in Persian mythology, most famously associated with the hero Rostam in the Shahnameh, the national epic of Greater Iran. This armor is said to be impenetrable and was a gift to Rostam from his father, Zal.

items.name: Darius
items.desc: Darius is a name steeped in Persian history and royal legacy, famously associated with Darius the Great, A helmet named Darius would reflect these attributes, carrying an air of regal authority and strength.

items.name: Simurgh
items.desc: The simurgh (/sɪˈmɜːrɡ/; Persian: سیمرغ, also spelled senmurv, simorgh, simorg, simurg, simoorg, simorq or simourv) is a benevolent bird in Persian mythology and literature. It bears some similarities with mythological birds from different origins, such as the phoenix (Persian: ققنوس quqnūs) and the humā (Persian: هما).

items.name: Vesta
items.desc: Vesta is the Roman goddess of the hearth, home, and family. She was highly revered in Roman religion as the protector of domestic life, symbolizing warmth, purity, and the sustaining flame of the home. Vesta was often associated with the fire that burned in the hearth of every Roman household and in the public hearths of temples.

items.name: Galea
items.desc: A short and evocative name for the most famous Roman helmet, associated with Mars, would be "Galea". This name directly references the Latin word for a helmet and carries the connotation of martial power and protection, making it a fitting and straightforward name for such an iconic piece of mythological armor.

items.name: Gladius
items.desc: Swords were one of the main Roman weapons and the Roman army used not one but two kinds of swords. The first of these was called the gladius.

items.name: Frostguard
items.desc: Frostguard is a fitting name for a Viking armor, evoking the harsh and unforgiving cold of the northern lands the Vikings called home. The name suggests an armor that provides both protection and endurance in the face of extreme elements.

items.name: Stormhorn
items.desc: The name "Stormhorn" implies a helmet worn by a warrior who embodies the raw, untamed power of a storm. It suggests a person who is both fierce in battle and deeply connected to the primal forces of nature

items.name: Bloodaxe
items.desc: Bloodaxe, also known as the “Hatchet of Northern Europe”, was named after its notorious owner, King Harald Fairhair. According to Norse legend, King Harald was given the sword as a young boy, and it became his weapon of choice as he conquered Norway and consolidated his power over the region.

augments.name: Quick Start
augments.desc: Gain 14 XP.

augments.name: Level Boost
augments.desc: Gain 6 XP now and the start of next stages

augments.name: Endgame
augments.desc: When you reach Level 9, gain 30 gold

augments.name: Double Streak
augments.desc: Gain 2 times the streak amount.(Max 2Gold) (1 avg gold)

augments.name: Safe Savings
augments.desc: Gain 1 gold and 1 gold every round.

augments.name: Lucky Drop
augments.desc: Each kill has a 25% chance to drop gold.

augments.name: Component Crafter
augments.desc: Gain a random item component and component avnil(box offer 3 choices)

augments.name: Early Forge
augments.desc: Receive a random item at the start of each stage.

augments.name: Item Reward
augments.desc: Gain an extra item component every 4 wins.

augments.name: Restricted Storage
augments.desc: For the upcoming stage, your bench is limited to only 1 slot. However, at the start of the next stage, you are rewarded with 3 random completed items.

augments.name: Free Spin
augments.desc: Start of Each Stage gain 3 free rolls

augments.name: Saver's Reroll
augments.desc: Receive a free roll if no purchases were made in the shop during the previous round.

augments.name: Backup Reroll
augments.desc: Gain 2 reroll now and gain 1 reroll after losing a player combat

augments.name: Lucky Pick
augments.desc: Gain a free reroll with a 10% chance after every round.

augments.name: Healthy Boost
augments.desc: Increase your current and max player health by 25.

augments.name: All Tier One
augments.desc: Gain a copy of each Tier One champion.

augments.name: Scorching Strikes
augments.desc: Fire units' basic attacks burn enemies for 3% of the damage dealt over 3 seconds. Abilities cause a small explosion, dealing 5% of the target's max health as area-of-effect (AoE) damage to nearby enemies.

augments.name: Chilling Touch
augments.desc: Water units’ basic attacks slow enemies by 15% for 2 seconds. Abilities have a 20% chance to freeze enemies for 1 second.

augments.name: Thunderous Impact
augments.desc: Storm units’ basic attacks have a 10% chance to stun enemies for 1 second. Abilities cause a small KnockBack, pushing enemies back 1 hex and reducing their Accuracy by 10% for 3 seconds.

augments.name: Radiant Precision
augments.desc: Light units’ basic attacks have a 10% chance to Cure themselves or a nearby ally, removing all debuffs. Abilities restore 3% health to Light units over 3 seconds (Recovery).

augments.name: Poisonous Shadows
augments.desc: Dark units' basic attacks have a 15% chance to poison the target, dealing 3% of their max health as damage over 3 seconds. Abilities have a 20% chance to inflict Nightmare, causing enemies to miss their next basic attack.

augments.name: Chaotic Surge
augments.desc: 1 level in  Accuracy every 10 seconds for 5 seconds.

augments.name: Cinematic Strike
augments.desc: 1 level in Defense every 10 seconds for 5 seconds

augments.name: Nature's Bulwark
augments.desc: 1 level in MP Recovery every 10 seconds for 5 seconds

augments.name: Rageborne Fury
augments.desc: 1 level in Attack Speed every 10 seconds for 5 seconds

augments.name: Iron Resolve
augments.desc: 1 level in Attack  every 10 seconds for 5 seconds

augments.name: Phantom Reflex
augments.desc: 1 level in Critical Damage every 10 seconds for 5 seconds

augments.name: Savage Momentum
augments.desc: 1 level in Physical and Magical Resistance every 10 seconds for 5 seconds

augments.name: Shield of Valor
augments.desc: 1 level in Critical Rate every 10 seconds for 5 seconds

augments.name: Bench Control
augments.desc: If you have all units on your bench or no unit's  at the end of a stage,  gain 2 experience points. (other than Consumables)

augments.name: Rapid Growth
augments.desc: Gain 6XP now. At the start of the next 4 rounds, gain 8 XP each round

augments.name: Empty Space
augments.desc: if there are no items on your bench, Gain 2 XP for every round ( start with 1 extra component box )

augments.name: Steady Income
augments.desc: Gain 8 gold now and for next 4 rounds

augments.name: investment++
augments.desc: max interest to 7 and gain 15 golds

augments.name: Treasure Vault
augments.desc: Gain 3 random item components, component box , and 1 Reforger

augments.name: Victory Craft
augments.desc: Earn 2 item components and a component box after every 4 victories

augments.name: Item Randomizer
augments.desc: At the start of each round, all items on your bench are randomized, also gain 2 random component

augments.name: Spin Boost
augments.desc: Start of Each Stage gain 5 free rolls

augments.name: Free Shoping
augments.desc: Gain shop reroll every round

augments.name: Symbol of Chaos
augments.desc: Gain a Chaos Emblem

augments.name: Seal of the Blockbuster
augments.desc: Gain a Blockbuster Emblem

augments.name: Crest of the Verdant
augments.desc: Gain a Druid Emblem

augments.name: Sigil of Wrath
augments.desc: Gain a Fury Emblem

augments.name: Badge of Girl Crush
augments.desc: Gain a Girl Crush Emblem

augments.name: Phantom's Insignia
augments.desc: Gain a Mirage Emblem

augments.name: Talisman of the Untamed
augments.desc: Gain a WildRush Emblem

augments.name: Oathkeeper’s Emblem
augments.desc: Gain a Guardian Emblem

augments.name: Blazing Assault
augments.desc: Fire units' basic attacks burn enemies for 5% of the damage dealt over 4 seconds. Abilities cause a larger explosion, dealing 7% of the target's max health as AoE damage to nearby enemies, and burning them for 2% of their max health over 2 seconds.

augments.name: Frozen Grasp
